data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Card,
        Overlay,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";

    let first_element;
    let last_element;
</script>

<Button
    is="label"
    for="overlay-focus-trapping-first-last"
>
    Open FOCUS TRAPPED Overlay
</Button>

<Overlay.Container
    logic_id="overlay-focus-trapping-first-last"
    focus_first={first_element}
    focus_last={last_element}
>
    <Overlay.Section>
        <Card.Container
            palette="inverse"
            max_width="75"
        >
            <Card.Header>
                FOCUS TRAPPED Overlay
            </Card.Header>

            <Card.Footer>
                <Overlay.Button
                    tabindex="3"
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss #3
                </Overlay.Button>

                <Overlay.Button
                    bind:element={first_element}
                    tabindex="1"
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss #1
                </Overlay.Button>

                <Overlay.Button
                    bind:element={last_element}
                    tabindex="5"
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss #5
                </Overlay.Button>

                <Overlay.Button
                    tabindex="4"
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss #4
                </Overlay.Button>

                <Overlay.Button
                    tabindex="2"
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss #2
                </Overlay.Button>
            </Card.Footer>
        </Card.Container>
    </Overlay.Section>
</Overlay.Container>
data.title: Overlay Focus Trapping First + Last
